content:
# The recipe for the Iron Gear Wheel requires 2 iron plates per gear wheel. 
# Since I currently have 12 iron plates in my inventory, I can craft a maximum of 6 iron gear wheels.

# Let's proceed to craft the iron gear wheels using the iron plates.
craft_item(Prototype.IronGearWheel, quantity=6)  # Craft 6 iron gear wheels.

# After crafting, I will check my inventory to confirm the number of iron gear wheels created and the remaining iron plates.
print(f"Inventory after crafting: {inspect_inventory()}")
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")
